name: REAP/SOW
description:
REAP/SOW is a small horror game about raising a Lovecraftian horror. It forever hungers and you will need to keep it happy. The rooms to your right and left contain simple challenges necessary to keep it fed. To one side, a monk sits, granting you the supplies you need, should you prove yourself worthy. To the other side, the sun, the eternal enemy of those that worship the old ones, guards the necessary food...

REAP/SOW is the first completed experience developed by Lantern Cult Games. Lantern Cult Games is as follows:

Art/Music: Samantha Huntington

Programming: Mark Jones

Design: Jeremy Stoway
